name: Anamitra

projects.title: Github Repository Creator
projects.description: Developed an application enabling users to log in through their GitHub accounts and create repositories with sample files seamlessly. The app utilizes GitHub OAuth for user authentication and JSON Web Token (JWT) for request authentication, ensuring secure interactions. User data is stored using PostgresDB/SQLite, while the application requires 'public profile', 'repo', and 'workflow' permissions from the user.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Crafted a captivating developer portfolio website utilizing React and Next.js, complemented by the aesthetic styling of Tailwind CSS. The site incorporates engaging animations powered by GSAP and Framer Motion libraries. Data is fetched from a local storage JSON file, resulting in seamless content updates and enhanced user experience.

projects.title: Single Image Super Resolution Using GAN
projects.description: Developed a cutting-edge GAN solution for transforming low-resolution images to high-resolution with unparalleled realism. The optimized GAN with more robust custom loss function and an overall efficient approach model surpasses SRResNet and SRCNN, delivering 3x faster processing. It also earned a Mean Opinion Score of 4.11 (out of 5) compared to SRResNet (2.98/5) and SRCNN (2.33/5), affirming its superior image enhancement capabilities.

projects.title: Insurance using Blockchain
projects.description: Developed blockchain-based health insurance smart contracts, ensuring secure and transparent transactions. Leveraging a minimal proxy approach, the implementation achieved remarkable reductions of 98% in contract size and 85% in deployment costs compared to traditional contract deployment methods. Additionally, currently working on a payment processor to facilitate seamless processing of payments using ERC20 stablecoins.
